title: Ola Electric plans to expand sales, service infra to 10k outlets by 2025-end
description: Ola Electric announced plans to establish 10,000 sales and service outlets by the end of 2025 to enhance its presence in smaller cities and towns, particularly in tier-2 and tier-3 areas with low EV penetration. The company has launched a network partner program and has already onboarded 625 partners, aiming for 1,000 before the festive season.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
